channel.title: Silent Barrage [ 317 ] Dedi hosted [ STAFF NEEDED ]
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Silent barrage![/size]
~ Links ~
Forums www.Silent-Barrage.Info[/center]
[center]Download our client![/center] [center]http://uppit.com/n4s3lyewmjbd/Silent_Barrage_Client_v1.0.zip[/center]
[CENTER]operates on a powerful dedicated server: - Intel® Core i7 820QM CPU 2700K @ 3.4GHz (2 Processors). - 16 Cores With Hyperthreading technology. - 24GB of RAM. - Linux CentOs. - DDoS protection from all sorts of DDoS attacks.
[SIZE=4][B]~FEATURES~[/B][/SIZE] Economy Dungeoneering Completionist Cape and Requirements Highscores PK'ing / Staking community Full Farming Custom bosses Skilling islands Slayer Chaotics PVP Overloads Curses Thieving stalls Balanced and fair economy Fully functional slayer Functional kiln, fight caves GWD Corp Tormented demons Frost dragons Castle wars Barrows All Chaotics Spirit shields Duel arena
~Bosses~ Armadyl Bandos Saradomin Zamorak Corp Tormented Demons
~Minigames~ Castle Wars Clan Wars Barrows Fight Pits
~Extra Stuff~ Very friendly and dedicated staff. Owners [ Ancient Prod & Matt ] New server looking for new staff!
[B][SIZE=4]~Pictures~ [/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fZQ8uTQ.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4GDY4ZJ.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YpI4ZvV.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y45gMBO.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uVZ9ez0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ygX8DKa.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nRDUKJ2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T8eqQqi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G6g7N2o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DG4X5b8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4pEogPb.jpg[/img]
[/CENTER]
